sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
      <v-text-field v-model="city" label="City" @keyup.enter="getWeather"></v-text-field>
      <v-btn @click="getWeather">Search</v-btn>
  
      <WeatherCard :weather="weather" :error="error" />
    </v-container>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  import { mapState } from 'vuex';
  import WeatherCard from '../components/WeatherCard.vue';
  
  export default {
    components: {
      WeatherCard
    },
    data() {
      return {
        city: ''
      };
    },
    computed: {
      ...mapState(['weather', 'error'])
    },
    methods: {
      getWeather() {
        this.$store.dispatch('fetchWeather', this.city);
      }
    }
  };
  </script>
